name: Halcyon Winter
description:
Halcyon Winter is coming, and you need to take a photo of a kingfisher.

You've taken an internship at a nature magazine, and your boss is an angry man with an unusual fixation on orange and blue birds.

The only the problem? The local kingfisher is... a bit of a handful. Can you help her overcome her existential crisis and take the perfect photo to please your editor?

This short visual novel takes around fifteen minutes to complete, is build to run on original Game Boy Color hardware, and features two possible endings.

PS: There's nothing wrong with your speaker, this game currently has no sound. It's probably for the best, given the kingfisher's singing.
